HEPCO - CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN MÔI TRƯỜNG VÀ CÔ: HEPCO - Joint Stock Company of Environment and Urban Construction of Hue
CHỦ TỊCH HĐQT: Chairman of the Board of Directors
XÍ NGHIỆP MT&CTĐT HƯƠNG TRÀ: Huong Tra Urban Environment and Construction Enterprise
XÍ NGHIỆP MT&CTĐT HƯƠNG THUỶ: Huong Thuy Urban Environment and Construction Enterprise
Phát huy thế mạnh và đa dạng hoá lĩnh vự: Promoting strengths and diversifying fields of operation to become the leading environmental company in the Central - Central Highlands region
Với kinh nghiệm thực tiễn nhiều năm thực: With years of practical experience in environmental sanitation, construction, management, maintenance of drainage systems, sidewalks, public lighting systems, and street decoration, we continuously train and enhance the skills of our staff. We also establish partnerships with organizations and projects both domestically and internationally to share experiences and learn technologies. We actively seek opportunities to participate in urban beautification projects, as well as sustainable development and environmental education projects for the entire community.
Tiền thân là phòng quản lý đô thị và nhà: Originally established as the urban management and real estate  in 1975, and undergoing various transformative milestones, in 2015, the State-owned Environment and Urban Construction Company in Huế became the Hue Urban Environment And Public Works Joint Stock Company. As a state-owned enterprise controlling 51% of the shares, with an organizational structure comprising 5 functional departments and 13 subordinate units, Hepco is a reputable entity operating in the field of environmental sanitation and urban construction in the central region, serving nearly 500 customers and partners throughout Thừa Thiên Huế province.
Với phương châm phục vụ tận tâm – uy tín: With a commitment to serving wholeheartedly, maintaining credibility, and taking responsibility, Hepco pledges to provide customers with optimal solutions at the most reasonable and competitive prices. Please feel free to contact us to experience professionalism and quality service. Your satisfaction is the key to our success.
Bên cạnh hoạt động sản xuất kinh doanh,: In addition to business activities, Hepco regularly conducts programs, campaigns, and events to raise public awareness about environmental protection. The company, along with political and social organizations within it, frequently organizes educational programs on political ideology, takes care of the lives of employees, engages in community activities, and promotes environmentally friendly initiatives for sustainable development.
Với quá trình hình thành và phát triển,: With nearly 50 years of expertise in environmental sanitation and urban construction, supported by experienced management, skilled labor, and modern equipment infrastructure, we are committed to providing our customers with the best and most reliable services. We pledge to accompany our customers on the journey of environmental protection and sustainable development.
Hepco là doanh nghiệp có 51% vốn nhà nướ: Hepco is a state-owned enterprise with 51% government capital and 49% shareholder capital.
Hepco cam kết mang đến trải nghiệm tốt n: Hepco is committed to delivering the best experience for customers and is always ready to listen to any feedback, address inquiries, and respond to customer concerns through various communication channels such as hotlines, websites, and fan pages. We aim to do so promptly and satisfactorily.
